history.proof: intros x y H. specialize (Zgcd_spec x y) as [d [Hgcd Hd]]. destruct (Z.eq_dec d 0) as [Hd0 | Hd0]. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - exists d. split; [split | split]; auto. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + hauto lq: on depth: 3. + hauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: split; [split | split]; try rewrite Hd0; try apply Z.le_neq; auto.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros x y H. specialize (Zgcd_spec x y) as [d [Hgcd Hd]]. destruct (Z.eq_dec d 0) as [Hd0 | Hd0]. - exists 1. split; [split | split]; try rewrite Hd0; try apply Z.le_neq; auto. - exists d. split; [split | split]; auto. + intros contra. apply Hd0. apply Z.lt_neq. apply Z.lt_gt. apply Zgcd_spec.
